body:
Thank you,

The documentation just seems confusing to me then, because I can put the " anywhere else with LazyQuotes on
but the only time it goes 'wrong' (no error) is when I put the " as first character on the right of the delimiter (or start of line)

If this is not a bug, how can I request a feature, that would add a config option to totally disable the "quoted field" ability?
the reason is, I want to use the csv package to check data not generated by myself, which could contain any character, however the only consistent item is the delimiter. therefor a " can exist anywhere in the data.

Thanks for your help
